name: Freddy Scary Bear Jump in Fright Night For FNAF
name_original: Freddy Scary Bear Jump in Fright Night For FNAF
description:
IF you are Freddy and FNAF Lover this game is for YOU
What does the FNAF Freddy say? Let us jump over Pizzas and catch those sheep and chicks!

Play as the awesome Freddy who can jump from one Pizza to the other. Target, aim and shoot to make sure it lands on the other side. Easy to play, all you have to do is to tap your screen once to jump. Then, tap twice to double jump. It is a physics-based game that will surely increase your talent and skills. Fly each round and use your head to get those hard to reach chick and sheep. Score as high as you can and you will truly have nice time playing.

Game Features:
> Physics-based game
> Easy Navigation
> Fun and exciting levels
>Awesome Experience
